resources.string: Together we will do some exercise every 20 minutes.\n\nHope you are ready for it!
Every 20 minutes we will stand up and get some exercise.\n\nWhen the notification appears, click \"Later!\" if you want to delay by 5 minutes.

string-array.name: notification_messages
string-array.item: Care to walk about? Maybe jump or dance?
We\'ve been sitting long enough, let\'s move!
